item.title: Preparing for the Massive Influx of Tourists in 2022
item.description: Did this headline catch your attention? Is it merely wishful thinking or something our industry needs to be prepared for? As baseball’s legend Yogi Berra once said, “It’s tough to make predictions, especially about the future.” However, this isn’t stopping some social scientists from believing that we may shortly experience something like the ‘roaring 20s’, when the 1920s experienced a social boom after a long period of war, Spanish flu and other uncertainties.
